alert.note: Alert for Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:23PM EDT until July 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL RUTLAND AND CENTRAL WINDSOR COUNTIES... At 323 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bridgewater Corners, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Woodstock, Barnard, Plymouth, Bridgewater, Stockbridge, Reading, Killington, Plymouth Union, Bridgewater Corners, Bridgewater Center, Calvin Coolidge State Park, Silver Lake State Park and Coolidge State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
